description:
Pixellu SmartAlbums is a professional album design software that simplifies and speeds up the process of creating stunning photo albums for photographers.

Pixellu SmartAlbums is a professional album design software that simplifies and speeds up the process of creating stunning photo albums for photographers.

Key Features:
- Automated Layouts – AI-powered tools arrange photos beautifully with minimal effort.
- Customizable Templates – Choose from various pre-designed templates or create your own.
- Drag-and-Drop Editing – Easily adjust layouts, spacing, and backgrounds.
- Fast Workflow – Batch editing and synchronization save time.
- Client Proofing – Share digital proofs for easy online review and approval.
- High-Quality Export – Supports print-ready PDFs and JPEGs.
